code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Bugs(){const[bugs,setBugs]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBugs=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/bugs',{headers:{Authorization:token}});setBugs(res.data);};fetchBugs();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Bugs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:bugs.map(bug=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:bug.title},bug._id))})]});}export default Bugs;
